Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet
Description: A brown-glazed faience figure of the god Thoth, depicted with the head of an ibis and the body of a man. He strides with the left leg forward and has both arms down at his sides. The features are a little crude, the kilt finely pleated. A loop for suspension is on the head.
